post:
![](http://nanovz.com/img/logo5.png)

--------------------------
With help from @AnthonySmith and @PetaByet I'd like to bring out NanoVZ.com
LowEndSpirit Style VPS.

Benchmark: <a href="https://www.petabyet.com/result/2014-09-18-849e7e4820f7c194f9593f3d45613755/">PetaByet - NanoVZ Lenoir, NC</a>

<pre>
1vCPU Core
128MB Guaranteed RAM
128MB vSwap
3GB SAS (15k) HDD
500GB Transfer @ 1Gbit
NAT IPv4 (20 Forwarded Ports + 1 SSH Forwarded Port)
/64 IPv6 Subnet (yes.. 18,446,744,073,709,551,616 on a Tiny VPS) 
TUN/TAP Enabled
PPP Enabled

Location: Lenoir, North Carolina
<a href="https://my.nanovz.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=1">Order Link</a>
</pre>

Of course, you know the drill by now with Anthony and Oliver's LowEndSpirit VPS' 
This isn't for the faint hearted, although i believe it makes it easier having a pre forwarded SSH Port, Not for usage of TOR or Torrent Clients or anything Illegal etc, this will result in immediate termination of your VPS Server. 

Service is Automatically Provisioned, and has an easy way to setup a Reverse Proxy (for those that wish to have access via Port 80 for web servers)

![](http://nanovz.com/img/snip.jpg)

and coming within the next month I will have a European Location.

Website: <a href="http://www.nanovz.com">NanoVZ.com</a>
Billing: <a href="https://my.nanovz.com">my.NanoVZ.com</a>

Regards,
Ryan
